Free-hand demand curves

We do not always draw a demand curve based on data. In most cases, we draw free-hand demand curves.

Watch the following video clip to see how the demand curve is drawn as a free-hand demand curve: 

Of significance here is the fact that it represents the law of demand, which is the negative or inverse relationship between the price and quantity demanded.

Do the following activity to see if you understand the law of demand as a demand curve:
